page.title: 06 TRANSPORT CHANGES
page.content: Changes in {traffic flow} from the { {east} as a result of the building of: (a){Itchen Bridge(1977)},(b){M27(1984) (c) {Bitterne Bypass(1984).}Reduction along Bitterne Road was 21%, according to statistics.Michelle & Vanessa interviewed the lollipop man,who has lived along Bitterne Road since 1961. He thought that,since then,the Bitterne Road had taken approximately five times the amount of traffic and there have been many accidents.Alex interviewed a bus driver who said that the building of (a),(b) & (c) had helped:particularly (b).Naomi and Alex interviewed Mrs.Rusling who travels into Southampton each schoolday.She travels approximately 5.5 km. to work. She said that traffic flow had improved,despite the traffic lights. The journey,which took 25 minutes in 1981,now takes 12 minutes.
